description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f7euh","text":"This protocol details the expression and purification of enterovirus D68 3C protease construct bearing a C-terminal His-tag at small scale (\u003c6L).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"e7vro","text":"Construct / plasmid resource-name: Enterovirus D68 3C protease construct bearing a C-terminal His-tag that crystallised in the space group P212121","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35},{"style":"sub","offset":141,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":143,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":145,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ssr9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qrh1","text":"Brief description of the plasmid: This protein yielded highly reproducible crystals upon microseeding, which typically diffracted to 1.7 Ã… resolution. This crystal system was DMSO tolerant and therefore suitable for our subsequent fragment soaking.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qpba","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"547uo","text":"Provided Date: 2022-03-24","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f6mjb","text":"Transform the D68EV3C construct (Addgene plasmid #204817)  into BL21(DE3) and store a glycerol stock of this at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2n0lq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpc5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2E80FE0AFD6811EE87410A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4c9u9","text":"The D68EV3C construct encodes the 3C protease with a non-cleavable C-terminal his tag on a kanamycin resistant plasmid backbone with a T7 promoter.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s9os","text":"When the OD600 reaches approximately 4.0, lower the temperature and shaker speed to   and incubate   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":99,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"384F687003AC11EFA6E50A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"200","start":null,"temperature":"18","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"384F692A03AC11EFA6E50A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"180","start":null,"temperature":"18","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nlp2","text":"Perform IMAC to extract target protein from the lysed cell mixture    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v8j8","text":"Wash the column with   of wash buffer twice. Allow wash buffer to pass through completely between washes. This is to remove non-specific, weak binding of contaminant proteins from the resin for a cleaner elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5c9k","text":"Collect washes separately for SDS-PAGE analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k7dm","text":"Using an AKTA Pure FPLC system or equivalent:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63bpt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h1ud","text":"Inject the sample onto a 5mL sample loop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h1h6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f4q2","text":"Run the sample down Sepax SRT SEC-100Â gel filtration column at 7.5mL/min in gel filtration buffer, collecting 1mL fractions in 96 well deep-well blocks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"694h6","text":"The column should be pre-equilibrated in SEC buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq93j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29i5f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"drgum","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76bpa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a1avj","text":"Here a SEPAX SEC SRT-100 column was used due to availability, however other columns would also be suitable such as a Superdex 75 16/60 (Cytiva)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvv1p","text":"Aliquot into appropriate volumes for future usage to minimise freeze/thaw cycles. Flash-freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at   until required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":128,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"tteu","text":"For example:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ug12","text":"The final yield from processing 2 L of cells was 128 mg of pure D68 EV 3C protease","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67if7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"osf4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ec3cr","text":"Use the   starter culture to inoculate     (see Materials) supplemented with   kanamycin in a baffled flask. this protocol typically 2 L of culture is grown for each purification","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3a3qe","text":"Harvest the cells by centrifugation  at  . Discard supernatant and store pellet at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":1800,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e2m1t","text":"Lyse cell pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v6oh","text":"Store the homogenised lysate at   and then thaw in a room temperature water bath to further lyse the cells, freeze-thaw.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djrib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AEA437FEFD6E11EE87410A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq7mb","text":"Pour the clarified supernatant over the equilibrated resin and allow to flow though. This will allow the His-tagged target protein to bind onto the Ni ions in the resin. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"313o0","text":"Retain the flow through separately for SDS-PAGE analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ccm4","text":"Elute the protein with   of elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","concentration":"0.5","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"CDE35FD0A01A11EE951C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67kh0","text":"Repeat step 7.5 a further 2 times, collecting a total of 3 separate elution fractions. This is to ensure maximum retrieval of protein from the resin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k34v","text":"Measured the A280 values of the elution fractions to estimate the protein content","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58ou3","text":"For example:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgokj","text":"E1: A280=5.69","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c51io","text":"E2: A280=10.1 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b716l","text":"E3: A280=4.23","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6h0o","text":"Scrape off some of the glycerol stock with a sterile loop and use this to inoculate a 50 mL falcon tube containing   of LB supplemented with   kanamycin. Grow the starter culture at       with 200 rpm shaking.
